programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The mayor devises a plan to make the town's Fourth of July celebration memorable, despite a ban on fireworks; and Mr. Hat vanishes, causing Mr. Garrison to visit a therapist.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Chef's Chocolate Salty Balls - S2 Ep. 9
programme.desc: Hollywood pooh-bahs in town for a film festival try to sign Mr. Hankey to a movie deal after their upscale cuisine disrupts the sewage system and nearly destroys him. Meanwhile, locals are up in arms over the movie-industry event.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The town faces an outbreak of chicken pox.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Roger Ebert Should Lay Off the Fatty Foods - S2 Ep. 11
programme.desc: Stan, Kyle and Kenny gravitate toward a new planetarium; and Cartman auditions to be the star of "Les Miserables."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys each build a clubhouse---and Stan is eager to have Wendy over for a game of "truth or dare." However, his parents' separation interferes with his plans.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: During South Park's annual rodeo, the boys compete in a bull-riding contest. Meanwhile, the cows find religion.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Chef invites some of his well-known musician friends to participate in a benefit concert after he loses all of his money in a lawsuit. Meanwhile, the boys join the workforce to help him get out of debt.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan fears his pet fish may be involved with a rash of unsolved murders that occur on Halloween. Meanwhile, Cartman starts killing people---with kindness, even going so far as to appreciate Wendy's liberal views.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Merry Christmas Charlie Manson! - S2 Ep. 16
programme.desc: The boys go to Cartman's grandmother's house for a holiday feast that's also attended by Cartman's uncle (an escaped con) and the police.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys work on a project with a high-strung kid whose parents' coffee shop faces strong competition from a conglomerate that hopes to set up in South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys accompany a teacher and her singing-and-dancing group to Central America to raise awareness of the rain forest. Also: Kenny falls for a choir member; and Kyle has trouble mastering the choreography.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Residents start to spontaneously combust, prompting Stan's geologist father to investigate.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: The Succubus (a.k.a. Chef's Mama) - S3 Ep. 3
programme.desc: Chef gets a visit from his mother when the boys feel his bride-to-be has taken their place in his heart.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys discover two nearly extinct animals while camping on the banks of Stark's Pond.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys take a shop class taught by an eccentric, and urge a schoolyard fight between classmates Tweek and Craig.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman sues Stan for sexual harassment.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Shelly baby-sits Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Two Guys Naked in a Hot Tub - S3 Ep. 8
programme.desc: A meteor shower hits town, and Stan's sister Shelly babysits Cartman while Mrs. Cartman goes to a "meteor party."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle and Ike go on a camping trip while South Park residents wait for a meteor shower to begin.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Korn's Groovy Pirate Ghost Mystery - S3 Ep. 10
programme.desc: On Halloween, the boys are plagued by fifth graders and the town is overrun by pirate ghosts. Music group Korn assists, and sings "Falling Away from Me."

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Adults try to counter when the town's children become obsessed with a fad from Japan, whose government reveals their master plan behind the craze.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Hooked on Monkey Fonics - S3 Ep. 12
programme.desc: Kyle tries to teach his new rival about love; the boys compete against home-schooled kids in the annual spelling bee; and Cartman's mom agrees to teach him at home.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Starvin' Marvin in Space! - S3 Ep. 13
programme.desc: Starvin Marvin returns in a stolen U.S. spaceship, and enlists the boys to help feed his Ethiopian village. The CIA is among their pursuers.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: The Red Badge of Gayness (a.k.a. War) - S3 Ep. 14
programme.desc: The town holds its annual reenactment of a Civil War battle, and Cartman suits up for the Confederacy with visions of glory.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Mr. Hankey's Christmas Classics - S3 Ep. 15
programme.desc: Mr. Hankey and South Park citizens celebrate the holidays with musical numbers from his Christmas Classics Album.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Are You There God, It's Me Jesus - S3 Ep. 16
programme.desc: "Are You There, God? It's Me, Jesus" purports to "answer age-old questions about who we are and what we're all about."

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Worldwide Recorder Concert (a.k.a. The Brown Noise) - S3 Ep. 17
programme.desc: The boys and their class travel to the first "Worldwide Recorder Concert" in Arkansas, where Mr. Garrison confronts the demons of his childhood while visiting his parents.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: The Tooth Fairy's TATS 2000 - S4 Ep. 1
programme.desc: Cartman impersonates the Tooth Fairy when he learns there's money to be made from harvesting the teeth of underprivileged kids. However, the leader of a dentists' organization sets out to stop him.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Cartman's Silly Hate Crime 2000 - S4 Ep. 2
programme.desc: Cartman is sentenced to juvenile hall and his friends plan to get him out. Meanwhile, he begins to adjust to life on the inside.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The South Park media showers attention on a family with quintuplets that moves into the area, and Cartman befriends one of the new residents. Meanwhile, Kenny's mom tries to cash in on the excitement by planning a multiple birth of her own.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman seeks online companionship from older users after deciding that Stan, Kenny and Kyle aren't mature enough.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle suffers from a rare kidney disease and Cartman may be the only one who can save him, but at a high price.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Chef protests against the South Park flag and ignites a town debate that even divides the kids. Meanwhile, Wendy becomes attracted to Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Something You Can Do with Your Finger (a.k.a. Fingerbang) - S4 Ep. 8
programme.desc: Stan, Kyle, Kenny and Cartman form their own band and hold tryouts for a fifth member.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Do the Handicapped Go to Hell? (1) - S4 Ep. 9
programme.desc: The boys, scared by Priest Maxi's threats of eternal damnation, scramble to take part in Holy Communion and their first Confession in order to "save" themselves.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Satan can't decide between his new boyfriend and his former beau, Saddam Hussein. Meanwhile, Cartman has discovered his evangelical side and tries to ensure the gang a passage to heaven.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The fearful boys speculate on the identity of their teacher as they begin the fourth grade, leading them to build a time machine to take them back to the safety of third grade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Mr. Garrison orders a recount when the race for kindergarten president is too close to call. Meanwhile, a life form from the future appears in the school yard at South Park Elementary.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Helen Keller! The Musical - S4 Ep. 13
programme.desc: The boys work on a Thanksgiving pageant about Helen Keller and decide to use a turkey instead of a dog.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman is sent to a camp for obese youngsters by concerned family and friends. Meanwhile, Kenny has his own hit TV show, "Krazy Kenny." Also, Chef talks to the boys about prostitution.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: The Wacky Molestation Adventure - S4 Ep. 16
programme.desc: Cartman becomes South Park's mayor when the kids take over the town.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Very Crappy Christmas - S4 Ep. 17
programme.desc: The boys make a video Christmas card when Mr. Hankey's visit is delayed.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Mr. Mackey excuses Timmy from homework when he mistakenly thinks the boy is suffering from Attention Deficit Disorder; then Cartman and his friends try to develop the same affliction.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: It Hits the Fan - S5 Ep. 1
programme.desc: The boys realize they may have made history of some sort when Cartman utters an expletive.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys join the Mountain Scouts with Timmy, who winds up in a fight with Jimmy in a supermarket parking lot.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A magician persuades Kenny, Cartman and Kyle to join his cult, and their journey lands them in Washington, D.C.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Scott Tenorman Must Die - S5 Ep. 4
programme.desc: Radiohead plays a role in Cartman's plan for revenge against an eighth-grader who wronged him.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow - S5 Ep. 5
programme.desc: The boys are devastated to learn that their heroes Terrence and Phillip have broken up.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman uses his $1 million inheritance to open his own amusement park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The impulsive implementation of sex-education classes at school leads to an all-out battle between the boys and the girls.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The gang tries to protect a new resident in South Park from the government.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Osama Bin Laden Has Farty Pants - S5 Ep. 9
programme.desc: The boys decide to get into the patriotic spirit by heeding the President's advice to send money to the children of Afghanistan. But their spirits sour when they receive a package back and their mail becomes the focus of Government investigators.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: How to Eat with Your Butt - S5 Ep. 10
programme.desc: As a prank, Cartman somehow gets Kenny's picture pasted on milk cartons as a missing child, which soon backfires on him.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: The Entity (a.k.a. The Ginger Device) - S5 Ep. 11
programme.desc: Kyle is embarrassed by his cousin, Kyle, and tries to think of ways to avoid him in front of his friends.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman discovers the benefits of stem-cell research.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Butters' Very Own Episode - S5 Ep. 14
programme.desc: Butters looks forward to his parents' anniversary dinner despite his mother's reaction to his father's secret extracurricular activities.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The kids become embroiled in the life of a disabled celebrity who breezes through town and gets all the attention.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys are under investigation for covering their teacher's house with toilet paper.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: I'm a Little Bit Country - S7 Ep. 4
programme.desc: The foul-mouthed youngsters return for a seventh season.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Fat Butt and Pancake Head - S7 Ep. 5
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck come to town.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The guys start their own detective agency.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys try to save the town from developers.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: South Park is Gay! - S7 Ep. 8
programme.desc: The whole town suddenly discovers it's all the rage to be gay.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman puts together a band; Stan, Kyle and Kenny get into trouble for downloading music from the Internet.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman seeks revenge for not being invited to Kyle's birthday outing.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: All About the Mormons? - S7 Ep. 12
programme.desc: Mormon neighbors move into town, causing the citizens of South Park to become Mormons themselves.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The guys rebel after an anti-smoking campaign begins at their school.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: When Stan's girlfriend breaks up with him, his friends try to cheer him up by bringing him to a local restaurant where lovely ladies hang out.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: South Park becomes flooded with time travelers from the future.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The kids have to choose a new mascot after an animal-rights group protests.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Something Wall-Mart This Way Comes - S8 Ep. 9
programme.desc: South Park is invaded by a giant shopping center that threatens the quiet little town.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Good Times with Weapons - S8 Ep. 1
programme.desc: After buying some martial arts objects at a market, the boys turn into Japanese warriors to take on their enemy, Prof. Chaos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: The Passion of the Jew - S8 Ep. 3
programme.desc: "The Passion of the Christ" has an unusual effect on Stan, Cartman, Kyle and Kenny.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: You Got F**ked in the Ass - S8 Ep. 4
programme.desc: Stan tries to put together a group of competitive dancers to challenge some rivals from Orange County.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman disguises himself as a robot so he can learn secrets about Butters to use against him.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A mysterious gentleman and his son create controversy in South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman, Butters, Kenny, Stan and Kyle fear that a secret may get out when an old adversary turns up in town.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman becomes a network honcho when he and the boys launch a morning news show on the school's closed-circuit TV station.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Stupid Spoiled Whore Video Playset - S8 Ep. 12
programme.desc: South Park is abuzz over a visit from a famous socialite.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman is imbued with the power to see into the future after he's hit on the head.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Woodland creatures ask Stan to help them build a manger.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Hippies, the bane of Cartman's existence, threaten to overrun South Park when they plan a weeklong music festival in town.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman, Kenny, Stan and Kyle become talent agents with one client.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Ostracized for his appearance because of a case of "gingervitus," Cartman goes on a campaign against discrimination.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle bonds with a marine-park whale and gets the boys to help try to return the creature to its family.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After his drunken-driving arrest, Stan's dad believes a visit to a bleeding statue of the Virgin Mary will cure his drinking problem.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Mr. Garrison's Fancy New Vagina - S9 Ep. 1
programme.desc: In the season 9 premiere, Mr. Garrison looks to become a woman, and Kyle works in improving his basketball skills.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kenny is able to purchase a gaming device that's been sold out, straining his friendship with Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys become bored with baseball after a long winning streak.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: The Death of Eric Cartman - S9 Ep. 6
programme.desc: Butters believes he can talk to the dead.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Jimmy has trouble controlling his hormones right before the big talent show.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Two Days Before the Day After Tomorrow - S9 Ep. 8
programme.desc: The town of Beaverton is flooded when a mammoth beaver dam breaks. Is global warming to blame? Only Stan and Cartman know for sure.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys decide to fake Butters' death and resurrect him as a girl.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Townsfolk rally against gay marriage, especially Mr. Garrison, whose ex Mr. Slave plans to wed Big Gay Al.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle bonds with a marine-park whale and gets the boys to help try to return the creature to its family.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: After his drunken-driving arrest, Stan's dad believes a visit to a bleeding statue of the Virgin Mary will cure his drinking problem.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan leads a campaign to purchase hybrid cars, but it stalls when an environmental disaster threatens the town.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: A Million Little Fibers - S10 Ep. 5
programme.desc: Oprah picks Towelie's memoir for her book club, but his account is found to be less than truthful. Soon, the public derision lures Towelie off the wagon.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: The Return of Chef - S10 Ep. 1
programme.desc: Chef Jerome McElroy returns, though the kids notice he's not quite the same.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman finds treasure when the boys get stuck in a cave.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman's mom employs the Dog Whisperer to help curb her son's behavioral problems.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Make Love, Not Warcraft - S10 Ep. 8
programme.desc: The gang attempts to save the online game World of Warcraft after it is taken over by a renegade gamer.

programme.title: South Park
programme.sub-title: Miss Teacher Bangs a Boy - S10 Ep. 10
programme.desc: Cartman is tapped to be the new hallway monitor and takes offense when Kyle discovers a teacher is having an affair with a student in his jurisdiction.
